title: WTB/WTTF- Last Five Of The Polar Bear Set
author: rommesc

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF- Last Five Of The Polar Bear Set
posts.post_content:
I am down to the final five needed for the Polar Bear T206 subset!  If you have one of these guys with PB back in Poor-Good condition please let me know. 
-Neal Ball
-Fred Burchell
-Bill Chappelle
-Dan Moeller
-Spike Shannon
